dcterms:creator: Amir-Hossein Karimi
Julius Von Kügelgen
Bernhard Schölkopf
Isabel Valera
dcterms:description: A semi-synthetic dataset about a loan approval scenario derived from the German Credit dataset, consisting of 7 endogenous features including loan amount, loan duration, income, savings, education level, age, and gender. The label indicates the probability of loan approval.
dcterms:title: Loan Dataset

dcterms:creator: Pablo Sanchez-Martin
Miriam Rateike
Isabel Valera
dcterms:description: A semi-synthetic dataset about the annual income of a person derived from the real-world Adult dataset, consisting of 10 endogenous features including age, education level, hours worked per week, race, native country, sex, work status, marital status, occupation sector, and relationship status.
dcterms:title: Adult Dataset

dcterms:creator: Markus Kalisch
Peter Bühlman
dcterms:description: A real-world dataset that aims to predict whether a project on DonorsChoose.org is exciting to the business, consisting of 10 endogenous features related to project funding and donor engagement.
dcterms:title: Donors Dataset
